accuracy.description: The degree to which the categorization of items corresponds to botanical definitions.

accepted_values.minor_errors: One or two items are misclassified.
accepted_values.incorrect: Most items are misclassified or the categorization is entirely wrong.

completeness.description: The completeness of the task, including all steps required to fully address the question asked.

accepted_values.complete: All steps are addressed and the task is fully resolved.
accepted_values.mostly_complete: Most steps are addressed, but minor aspects are not fully resolved.
accepted_values.partially_complete: Some significant steps are missing or incomplete.
accepted_values.incomplete: The task is left largely incomplete.

logic_traceability.description: The ability to follow the reasoning process of the multi-agent system.

accepted_values.transparent: Full reasoning trace is provided and easily understood.
accepted_values.opaque: Some reasoning is provided but unclear or difficult to follow.
accepted_values.hidden: Very little reasoning is provided, hard to follow the logic.

botanical_knowledge_usage.description: Utilization of accurate botanical knowledge in categorizing items.

accepted_values.knowledgeable: Displays adequate botanical knowledge with minor inaccuracies.
accepted_values.limited_knowledge: Shows basic understanding with several inaccuracies.
accepted_values.incorrect_knowledge: Displays incorrect or no botanical knowledge.

efficient_processing.description: Efficiency in performing the task with minimal unnecessary steps.

accepted_values.highly_efficient: No unnecessary steps, task performed optimally.
accepted_values.inefficient: Several unnecessary or redundant steps present.

communication.description: Clarity and effectiveness of communication to the user.

accepted_values.clear_concise: Communication is clear and to the point.
accepted_values.clear_with_extra_information: Clear communication but includes unnecessary information.
accepted_values.unclear: Communication is not clear and may confuse the user.
accepted_values.misleading: Communication is misleading or entirely incorrect.

response_format.description: The format in which the response is presented, including alphabetization and list formatting.

accepted_values.correct_format: The response is properly formatted and alphabetized.
accepted_values.minor_format_issues: The response has minor formatting issues but largely correct.
accepted_values.major_format_issues: The response has major formatting issues.
accepted_values.incorrect_format: The response format does not meet the criteria specified.
